name: Nil's Puzzle
description:
- a simple puzzle game that will challenge your mind -

nil /nil/ noun | nothing; naught; zero.

Nil's Puzzle revolves around the concept of breaking the zero-sum game. How much can you get out of the game that normally returns 0 at the end?

The cycle of +50, +30, +20, -100, x2, /2 makes a zero. How will you exploit the loop to score high?

Move your mark to any adjacent tile, score points, return more than nil.
